article_title: Sen. Gregg’s Sunday column distorts reality
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: May 22 — To the Editor:Congratulations to former Sen. Gregg for accomplishing the near impossible in his "Trump and Clinton are two sides of one coin" piece in this week’s Seacoast Sunday. In one article he managed to completely revise the history of the past eight years, created a false equivalency between Donald Trump and Hilary Clinton, and blames the victim for the rise of the likes of a Donald Trump.He states that presidents are given a "first 100 days" grace period, that
